channel.title: Lets make a Neutral class together
channel.description:
Suggest an individual piece of a class.
We need:
A name A type Ability's Wincon
Post 1 ability or 1 of the others and we will put it all together to see what we get.
> # **Rioter** > > Passive 1: rIOT! - if there are more than 2 rioters the monarchy can be overthrown > Passive 2: riot the riot - If at any point there are more than 3 rioters (4+) the oldest one shall be killed. > > Night Ability 1: Rebell - Convert target into a rioter. Will only work if target is convertible. Can only be used after N6. 1 use. > Night Ability 2: Trample - Kill and occupy target player. 2 uses > *Goal: Make sure a Rioter is king at the end of the game.*

item.source: Lets make a Neutral class together

item.title: Lets make a Neutral class together
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Suggest an individual piece of a class.

We need:

A name
A type
Ability’s
Wincon

Post 1 ability or 1 of the others and we will put it all together to see what we get.

Rioter

Passive 1: rIOT! - if there are more than 2 rioters the monarchy can be overthrown
Passive 2: riot the riot - If at any point there are more than 3 rioters (4+) the oldest one shall be killed.

Night Ability 1: Rebell - Convert target into a rioter. Will only work if target is convertible. Can only be used after N6. 1 use.
Night Ability 2: Trample - Kill and occupy target player. 2 uses
Goal: Make sure a Rioter is king at the end of the game.

Read full topic
item.source: Lets make a Neutral class together
